headline: Bank of America Bets on 2 Little-Known ‘Strong Buy’ AI Chip Stocks
summary: The surge in AI investment is rippling through the semiconductor supply chain in ways that go beyond GPUs and CPUs. Building and scaling modern data centers requires a growing amount of specialized connectivity and networking silicon, creating opportunities for companies positioned in the high-speed data movement segment of the market. While Nvidia grabs headlines for powering AI brains, a different class of chipmakers is quietly building the nervous system that connects them. As data centers sc
